name: busytex-async
description: Compile LaTex in your browser using WASM and asynchronously load required Tex packages

scripts.build: npx tsc && npx browserify build-js/src/BusytexAsync.js -o build-js/src/BusytexAsync.browser.js --ignore-missing --standalone BusytexAsync
scripts.test: npm run build && npx mocha build-js/test --ui tdd

author: Benjamin Klotz
